Name: treatment of decommissioned tram track | decommissioned tram track | EN15804GD, U
Category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery
Description: Similar as for road disposal is assumed a complete reuse and recycling of infrastructure materials. Consequently is merely accounted transport of the materials over a distance of 20 km.
